name: Amazing Alia
description:
Alia bhatt is famous bollywood actress and she recently was talk of the town on social media for her IQ test round on coffee Show. then after lot of trolls were made on her.

Amazing Alia is a physics based 2d puzzle game , where you need to help alia clear stages and move forward.

- More then 50 stages
- Interactive Design
- Best in-game animation

Help alia clear the levels now
